episodes.description:
#KaalaBairavan #DevotionalDrama #Bhairavnath #Jogeshwari #Shankar #Parvati #ThanthiOne

The story of Bhairavan, a devout devotee of Shiva! Jogeshwari has been born as the daughter of Dakshan, who hates Shiva and worships Vishnu. She is a devout devotee of Mahadeva. Jogeshwari's father decides to get her married, but Jogeshwari is not interested in the marriage because she is a woman dedicated to Bhairavan...
